title: How do you deal with people reporting you for "boosting"?
body: You see, I want to get the shiny skin for Maokai so I am just playing my placements matches. After finishing this game someone said he/she was rpeorting me for boosting, which is funny cuz this is my only account. (I changed my summoner to Another meal).[](https://postimg.org/image/nb0iymerh/)

replies.body:
you can't get banned for boosting if you arent boosting :P

Unless you suddenly win like 10 games in a row with a 10.0 kda

> [{quoted}](name=LvI 1 Bidoof,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xmaBh6Jp,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-01T00:23:43.679+0000)
>
> you can't get banned for boosting if you arent boosting :P

This is pretty much it.   Play your games, with the champs you usually play.  There's some number crunching (and voodoo magic involved) that some of the smart tech-savvy guys can explain a hell of a lot better than I can, but basically, if you're not boosting, then you shouldn't have much to worry about.

even if u win like 10 games in a row with 10.0 kda, rito isnt gonna ban u if their algorithm thinks u might have been couched by a higher elo player. ~~rito's philosophy in being serious about false positives is also why we see bunch of boosted diamond V that do not get banned~~

> [{quoted}](name=SAO T1 Yui,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xmaBh6Jp,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-11-01T02:15:24.702+0000)
>
> even if u win like 10 games in a row with 10.0 kda, rito isnt gonna ban u if their algorithm thinks u might have been couched by a higher elo player. ~~rito's philosophy in being serious about false positives is also why we see bunch of boosted diamond V that do not get banned~~

I lold xD
Take it as a compliment and move on lol.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
seems as if someone is salty for their shit soraka game
the sheep think every one is boosted when they come the the boards and post threads asking for people go carry them out of bronze/silver etc of whatever elo they think they are above

Mostly I respond with uproarious laughter.

I'm silver 5. Nobody would pay to be "boosted" to silver.

treat it like any other false report, where the system is going to check if the report is true, if not the system will throw it away.

However, if it was true, then there is no way to hide it.
